hero.title: Welcome to my portfolio!

post.title: 00/ About me
post.content: Hello, I'm @TylorDev, a passionate frontend web developer who loves creating modern and functional web applications. With experience in React, JavaScript, and CSS, I focus on building efficient and scalable solutions. My goal is always to provide an optimal user experience and work on innovative projects that make a difference.
